donor_name: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
outputs.output_descr: The overall objective of the project is quickly respond to the most immediate and critical logistics requirement for the security forces; hence improve on their operational capability and working conditions.  This will also enhance the maintenance of peace and stability and rule of law at the most critical and potentially volatile period in the country's transition.)
outputs.output_title: PBF- Emgy Sppt to Security Sec

project_descr: EMMERGENCY SUPPORT TO THE SECURITY SECTOR
